document_data.name: Gleamtail Jack
document_data.mainbody: A '''gleamtail jack''' was a type of fish known to live in the [[Elemental Chaos]].
document_data.Description: Gleamtail jacks were albino colored. They were about the size of a [[human]]'s thumb.
document_data.Abilities: Gleamtail jacks could swim through any elemental matter and could shift between [[planes]].
document_data.Scholarship: Information about gleamtail jacks could be found in the [[Vault of the Sages]] in the city of [[Silverymoon]].
